title: Arina No Tane
alternative_title: Arinas Sammelsurium ; 種村有菜漫畫隨筆集 ; Seed of Arina ; 有菜の種
status: Arinas Sammelsurium ; 種村有菜漫畫隨筆集 ; Seed of Arina ; 有菜の種
description:
Description :
        Have you always wanted to know who the star-mangaka really is? Then you have picked the right book. The author tells us in amusing little episodes about the beginnings of her career, her likings and interests, situations from her job as well as exclusive private scenes from holidays and her day to day life. With this manga you'll get really close to Arina Tanemura.
